EmailTemplate.name: REA Case Ownership Change
EmailTemplate.subject: REA Case Ownership Changed - {!Case.Account}, {!Case.Opportunity_Market__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there!
Your REA case has a new owner. Please see details below:
Opportunity Name {!Case.Opportunity__c} Case Name {!Case.Subject} New Case Owner {!Case.OwnerFullName} Case Stage {!Case.Status}
Helpful Links Case Link Opportunity Link Account Link
Sincerely, Real Estate Advisory Operations Team
